paper.title: Analyzing Paths in Time Petri Nets

author.org: (Correspd.) Department of Computer Science, Humboldt University, Berlin, Germany. popova@informatik.hu-berlin.de#TAB#
(Correspd.) Department of Computer Science, Humboldt University, Berlin, Germany. schlatter@informatik.hu-berlin.de#TAB#

paper.abstract: In this paper, a parametric description of a transition sequence in a Time Petri net is introduced. The minimal and maximal time duration of a transition sequence are shown to be integers and furthermore the min/max path passes only integer-states. A necessary condition for the reachability of an arbitrary state is given.
